title: news.com.au — Australia’s #1 news site
text: Immigration Minister David Coleman says the number of people arriving by plane to seek asylum has actually reduced, despite Labor’s claim it is the new way in which people smugglers are trying to sneak people into Australia. Mr Coleman said the number of asylum plane arrivals has dropped “12 per cent” in the last financial year and “we are seeing a reduction again”. “The key question is how many people have been approved [for asylum]. It’s significantly less than under Labor,” the Immigration Minister said.
